title: How to Make S'mores Jello Shots

steps.headline: Remove the centre of the marshmallows with either a small spoon or your fingers.
Prepare the water and a package of hot chocolate mix.
steps.description: Mix them together in a pot on the stove.

steps.headline: Sprinkle gelatin on top of the mixture.
steps.description: Let it sit for about five minutes.

steps.headline: Turn the stove on.
steps.description: Stir the mixture until it's boiling and the hot chocolate is fully dissolved into the water.

steps.headline: Pour the chocolate vodka into the mix.
Let the mixture sit for 30 minutes to cool.
Pour the mixture into the hole in the center of the marshmallows.
steps.description: You might want to use a small spoon to avoid spilling too much.

steps.headline: Coat any leftover mixture lightly around the top of the marshmallow for added effect.
steps.description: If there's no mixture left, use melted chocolate.

steps.headline: Crush up some graham crackers and sprinkle them on top of the marshmallow.

text: Get the marshmallows.  Remove the centre of the marshmallows with either a small spoon or your fingers.  Prepare the water and a package of hot chocolate mix. Mix them together in a pot on the stove. Sprinkle gelatin on top of the mixture. Let it sit for about five minutes. Turn the stove on. Stir the mixture until it's boiling and the hot chocolate is fully dissolved into the water. Pour the chocolate vodka into the mix.  Let the mixture sit for 30 minutes to cool.  Pour the mixture into the hole in the center of the marshmallows. You might want to use a small spoon to avoid spilling too much. Coat any leftover mixture lightly around the top of the marshmallow for added effect. If there's no mixture left, use melted chocolate. Crush up some graham crackers and sprinkle them on top of the marshmallow.  Enjoy the finished product.
